basic_info.motto: dedicated, good listener, team worker and honest
basic_info.summary:
I'm Computer Bachelors of Computer Sciences with more than 20 years of experience. 
I Started working applying my knowledge in programming and winning skills as lider 
and getting some manager roles. In this moment I keep doing manager roles but I love 
coding and that's why I keep studing new techs in programing as ReactJS.

experiences.details:
Responsible for development New Web Interfaces and Components for our QMATIC Orchestra Platform 
and development of new Applications that customers demand or need.

Responsible for development technological business with ours clients at differents sectors as finance, 
insurance, health, telecom, government and retails.

Responsible for all development, implementation and maintenance of the different applications 
and alternative systems to the banking core including Internet Banking and other Web Apps.

experiences.role: Project Manager / Product Manager / Systems Programer
experiences.details:
Different roles exercised from Programmer Analyst to Project Manager. In my last position I was 
responsible for the execution of Customer Flow Management Projects in sectors  such as finance, 
health, insurance, telecommunications among others.
